title: Books, papers, etc.
context: §240-2 Books, papers, etc. All books, papers, records, and accounts of such person shall at all reasonable times be open to inspection by the director of finance of such county, or the director&rsquo;s agents appointed for such purpose. [L 1937, c 105, pt of §1; RL 1945, pt of §5681; RL 1955, §131-2; HRS §240-2; gen ch 1985] Revision Note Reference to director of finance substituted for treasurer to conform to county charters.
